```{r}
A<- matrix(c(
  2,2,1,6,
  3,2,3,10,
  3,1,3,2
),nrow = 3,byrow = TRUE)

cat("Initial Matrix:\n")
print (A)

R2 <- A[2,]-(3/2)*A[1,]
R3 <- A[3,]-(3/2)*A[1,]

A_step2 <- rbind(A[1,], R2, R3)

cat("\nAfter Second Row Reduction Step:\n")
print(A_step2)
x_y_z_step2 <- -A_step2[3,1] - A_step2[3,2] - A_step2[3,3]

cat("\nx - y - z at step 2 =", x_y_z_step2, "\n")
factor <- R3[2]/ R2[2]

R3_new <- R3 - factor * R2
A_step3 <- rbind(A[1,], R2, R3_new)

cat("\nAfter Fourth Row Reduction Step:\n")
print(A_step3)

x_y_z_step4 <- -A_step3[3,1] - A_step3[3,2] - A_step3[3,3]

cat("\nx - y - z at step 4 =", x_y_z_step4, "\n")
```
